MESSAGE.value:
Fix Cilium network flows being incomplete (#138)
Noticed an issue where some flows from Hubble Relay were incomplete or not filled in with what we require in order to make sense of a flow log. This change addresses that by saying if any of what we need is nil we should consider this flow not worth attempting to resolve.
The values we are checking are either required for flow resolution or will never be null based on their assignment (DestinationService). Notice we are not checking for
// The CiliumNetworkPolicies allowing the egress of the flow. EgressAllowedBy // The CiliumNetworkPolicies allowing the ingress of the flow. IngressAllowedBy []*Policy // The CiliumNetworkPolicies denying the egress of the flow. EgressDeniedBy []*Policy // The CiliumNetworkPolicies denying the ingress of the flow. IngressDeniedBy []*Policy
The reason being is because flows are not guaranteed to have any of this if someone doesn't actually have any network policies configured in the first place, so even though they are "required" as part of our ciliumFlow proto message, we will not block pushing a flow downstream if these are nil or empty.

"[Log Level] Implemented configurable log level updates via gRPC" -m " Changes: - Added support for dynamic log level configuration (`config_stream.go`). - Implemented gRPC `SendConfigurationUpdates` stream to receive and apply log level updates. - Modified `k8sclustersync.proto` to include `SetLogLevel` in `ConfigurationUpdateRequest`. - Improved error handling and retry mechanism in `config_stream.go` for robust streaming. - Added unit tests (`config_stream_test.go`) to verify log level changes."
git commit -m "[Log Level] Implemented configurable log level updates via gRPC"
Implement configuration update stream listener for log-level updates.
Add unit tests for configuration update stream listener
Add log level configuration updates to KubernetesInfoService
Implement log level update handling in configuration stream
Enhance k8s_info.proto with detailed comments and improved structure
Enhance k8s_info.proto with detailed comments and improved structure. Regenerate k8s_info.pb.go to include updated proto messages. Regenerate k8s_info_grpc.pb.go after proto updates

Implement configuration update stream listener for log-level updates.
Standardize error message format for configuration stream
ListenToConfigurationStream` to correctly handle `oneof` response types

Update k8s_info.proto to add GetConfigurationUpdates RPC.
Regenerate gRPC bindings for k8s_info.proto and k8s_info.pb.go changes
Refactor configuration update handling in config_stream.go Update config_stream_test.go for improved test coverage
Remove log level updates from log stream responses. Removed dependency on `zap.SugaredLogger` for consistent logging using `zap.Logger`.
Add structured support for configuration updates and log-level control
Improved configuration update handling and logging Enhanced unit tests for configuration update handling. Improve stream management and error handling

Ensure GetConfigurationUpdatesRequest is an empty request.
Ensured proper error handling and fixed the unresolved reference error in streams.go
Add log level configuration updates to k8s_info.proto. Enhance config_stream.go for dynamic log level handling. Add unit tests for config_stream log level updates

git commit -m "Refactor gRPC logging and config updates
- Removed log level updates from log stream response - Implemented separate gRPC stream for config updates - Refactored BufferedGrpcWriteSyncer to remove redundant sendLogEntry logic - Improved log buffering and reconnection handling - Enhanced unit tests: TestBufferFlushOnReconnect, TestUpdateLogLevel, TestZapCoreWrapper, TestWriteBuffering - Updated proto definitions to remove redundant log-level update messages"

Refactor log level update handling and improve configuration stream tests
- Addressed review feedback by keeping the function streamlined and removing redundant code.
Added Test case for the TestSendLogEntry and added back the code that was deleted to make close() idempotent.
Implement auditing and logging for cloud-operator
resloved conflicts for the nocniplugin
"resloved the go.sum and go.mod"
added the test file for the streams retry
